WRITING.TITLE: Sleep deprived thoughts/drug experiences
WRITING.TEXT: I've been a heavy (6-10 bowls/day, thc pen, edibles, the works) marijuana user for about 3 years now, and I love the shit and it really helped me in college but I'm sick of it? It does absolutely nothing for me other than that want to take a hit. I used to be able to "astral project" from holding it in and it was incredible, but I haven't for about a year now. I just really feel like weed IS a gateway drug whether most stoners want to admit it or not. I started on weed, loved it and still do but I really have that urge to do more, chase the dragon. DPH I recently did dph for the first and second time, never again. Straight up 28 Benadryl 25 mg. It was absolutely insane and I was GONE. My friend thought I was dead for about 2 hours. I saw some female entity, which I never experienced before, basically tell me I'm welcome anytime. I only saw 1 shadow person and strangely, no "spiders" or "ants." My vision seemed to start to "glitch" though, like when a video game screen glitches and it was very disorienting. I didn't do the research like I should, and I really regret it. I cooked mac and cheese about 30 minutes in, and it started fine. That's when I met her and really started feeling it. My chest started to get tight and my heartrate skyrocketed. I took the mac and cheese off the burner, and I'm not sure for how long but I left the burner running and it scared the fuck out of me. I then went into my room, layed in bed completely disoriented and had trouble breathing for an hour and a half until I passed out. I could not move my body, I was stuck laying on my stomach until the sweet release of sleep took me away. Woke up feeling like shit. Overall I don't recommend it. I read it can give you early onset dementia so yeah, no. I think in low doses it could be relaxing but you'll just pass out. MDMA My friend messaged me and I asked about X literally 4 hours after waking up from dph, about 16 hours later. Never done it before, by the way. But I've heard it helps with mental health, so I've been chasing it with no luck until now. Took 2 at 9 pm Tuesday, and I stayed up until 10:30 am Thursday. Was a much more enjoyable experience than the dph for sure, but I read the same enzymes that break down dph break down X. I felt the speed high until 2 pm Wednesday, and didn't trip until then. I then had visuals come and go until I fell asleep this morning finally. Still feel pretty fucked. Sleeping 16 hours, staying up for like 38 then sleeping for 4 1/2 has been absolutely brutal and I wish I thought it through more, but I feel much better depression and bullshit wise so I don't regret it. I stayed up reading experiences of basically every drug that reddit has a subreddit for. It was fun. Then I got into conspiracy theories and /collapse. Idk, I just have a want to peer into the void and my mind. Reality is a bitch and I like to escape. #128150;
Tried to do paragraphs and it apparently didn't work so sorry y'all
Would rather die than be 100% sober tbh but I know. I feel like if something's available I'm gonna do it

This was my first time and I'm giving it the 3 month break, but I haven't had any neurotransmitters at a "good" level for pretty much my whole life. I'm on Effexor XR and it's bullshit. Ssris/snris are also bullshit. But I 100% agree, don't abuse mdma
I go up to my parents about once a week, and I try not to smoke there, but recently I have. When I don't, when I get home I get a little something but nothing worthwhile
Only thing I really abuse is weed and I'm just sick of it /: I wish it was possible to abuse MDMA because it was fucking incredible but I don't want to be a vegetable

I do to just go through the motions. I think it could be incredibly beneficial for physical illnesses but idk, mental health is so hard to fix or even get better at all and weed doesn't help anymore. When I first started it was nice and a good distraction, but now it only makes me cough. I don't smoke cigs so I think I use in place of it, as all my friends use nicotine/cigs Idk life just fucking sucks and I want another drug to take me away

Air duster is something I think you have to experience to stay away from. I was stupid and tried it, really fuckin loved it and went through about a whole can. I ended up falling onto the floor trying to sit on my bed fucked up on it and I will never touch the shit again. Felt horrible the next day. I don't have any permanent damage thank christ but I was lucky I just feel like "oh don't do it man" doesn't stop ANYONE needing to get high. You don't care about the consequences until it's too late I agree with the driving thing though. Fuck your whole life up on meth for all I care, don't drive on it and kill someone else. It isn't their fault you need to abuse substance and "need" Cheetos and a pack of Marborlos

I took kpin a few times and I hate benzos/downers in general. I just fall asleep but I'm so sorry that happened to you ): My bf in college left me because of weed and it was the dumbest bullshit ever I've noticed I'm not even happy on drugs, but I'm not completely suicidal and have that heavy "doom is inevitable" feeling like I do when sober

Drugs'll do that ;-; I'm completely over him, he was dumb in general. It just hurts my brain that he was willing to just completely cut contact with me over WEED I'm here to talk always too, but I give shit advice. At the start of my mental illness crap, I was really good at helping people, or so I thought. I'm just so pessimissic all the time, and it's hard to break out of
I'd probably take the M and chug the Mike's when you peak
Personally I feel a need to talk nonstop on it/other uppers, so being alone would be hell. I've been the only one on it in a group before but definitely don't do it alone m8
Nutmeg is a deliriant, so I'm bot surprised at such a low dose you're having good effects. Have 4 of them pea-sized pills and you'd probably start tripping -nuts-
It's best to feel the hell of 14 sober bud. If you're gonna do drugs stick to something you can't od on like weed
I wouldn't go above 500 for your first time. If you're not terrified after 1-3 times try 700-950
It's closer to DPH, which is a deliriant but hell whatever works lol
Was making mac n cheese on 550 mg and took it off the burner. Not sure how long I left the burner on, but long enough for an entity to tell me I'm welcome in ger realm anytime
Diphenhydramine, also known as Benadryl. It's basically the definition of a deliriant
Really sucks you had to have this adventure in a hospital. I hope you're doing better #128150;

WRITING.TITLE: Orthopteraphobia(fear of grasshoppers/crickets)
WRITING.TEXT: I've had this phobia all my life and right now it's in full force (I live in Iowa and it's the end of August #128530;) Nothing helps with it. Anyone else with this fear?
Mixing ANYTHING with weed is usually fine
Dxm doesn't really work on serotonin like mdma does. You should be fine :3
It'd still be physically fine, you'd just freak yourself out/get too paranoid

Not sure if this is the answer you're looking for, but my mother in law uses Vyvanse for her multiple personality disorder. She's a normal person on it but if she skips a few dose she'll start to "switch." She's said the most normal she's ever felt was on meth
Do you have any friends that could buy it for you? Or somewhere you could ship some from online?
I 100% understand! Age restrictions never stopped anyone
Ssris and snris are fine, but MAOIS will kill you

MDMA is off limits for Maoi users. Maois you basically can't take anything on. Thankfully you have a tryptamine inhibitor and SNRI so if you're careful you should be fine Opioids react on completely different receptors so there shouldn't be any interractions if that's your drug of choice. Anything that raises the serotonin in your brain can cause serotonin syndrome technically but personally I think it's a goddamn myth but that's personal experience Have fun and be safe!!!

WRITING.TITLE: Doesn #8217;t even have to be Christmas

WRITING.TEXT: It's so neat this type of phobia, I've looked at a lot of accounts of orthopteraphobic people and we're all the same. I completely accept a grasshopper can't do a thing to me. I'd rather get stung by a wasp than even LOOK at a grasshopper I haven't seen too many so far this year, but I only really go outside at night/for work. I'm a night owl as it is but I've seen them at night before which makes it so much worse. The thought they can be anywhere, at any time, waiting to jump and freak me out runs most of my life in the summer.

WRITING.TITLE: Great visual representation of how salvia feels
is this what 400+ mg trips are like
That feeling when it #8217;s never going to end

WRITING.TEXT: Been on it for a year and a half and I'm going through exactly this. I'm 21 and have been on different depression bullshit meds since 13. I want to know what's it's like without the constant migraines and vivid PTSD-esque dreams. It's gonna be hell the next few weeks but I'm gonna use MDMA, weed, and salvia to cope with the serotonin and norepenephrine loss
You're typing like I'm sure you're talking right now lmfao

Cutting feels great. That release of endorphins when you start to feel the stinging... watching the blood drip. I usually only cut as a coping mechanism, but I have cut just to cut many times. It's like huffing air duster, small reward for a big risk. But it's a risk I'm willing (and often) take
